```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)

library(EMinfs)
data("chloroprene_data")

# Assuming the column order from the original script
d <- chloroprene_data[, 9]
s <- chloroprene_data[, 11]
Ci <- chloroprene_data[, 8]
Xp <- as.matrix(chloroprene_data[, c(2, 3, 4, 13)])

model_fit <- estimate_em_model(
  d = d,
  s = s,
  Ci = Ci,
  Xp = Xp
)

# Print the main coefficients of interest (for failure time T)
print(model_fit$coefficients_t)

# To see all returned results, you can view the structure of the object
str(model_fit)
